descriptor.name: pTron Volta FC15 20W Fast PD/Type-C & USB Charger Adapter with Type-C 1M USB Cable, Auto-detect Technology, Multi-Layer Protection, iPhone & Android Compatibility Made in India Adaptor (White)
descriptor.short_desc: pTron Volta FC15 20W Fast PD/Type-C & USB Charger Adapter with Type-C 1M USB Cable, Auto-detect Technology, Multi-Layer Protection, iPhone & Android Compatibility Made in India Adaptor (White)
descriptor.long_desc:
1) Volta FC15 smart USB Charger comes with 20W Super Fast PD (Type-C) compatible Charging & 2.4A Type-C 1 Meter PVC Cable | Made in India 
2) Dual Port Power Adapter - 20W PD and 18W USB quick charging port | Freedom to Charge PD (Type-C) & QC compatible Android/iOS devices at fast speed & at the same time 
3) Smart USB Adapter: Equipped with intelligent IC which auto-detects the connected device and charges it at the fastest speed of the devices. 
4) Multi-layer Chipset Protection - The charger comes with multi-layer chipset protection that gives protection against short circuits, over-voltage and fire-resistance ABS body 
5) Volta FC15 charger is compact, lightweight, and can be carried out conveniently; Input AC 100-240V, PD Output DC 5V/3A, 9V/2.22A, 12V/1.67A. 6-months manufacturer warranty from the date of purchase.
